authors: Orp (based on Aqua Alex, Matthew Carpenter, Roric and all other Contributors' Additions)
instructions: Black Buttons Roll Advantage/Disadvantage Dice (+-1 and +-2). Red/Green Roll Normal Dice. Gray/Purple Buttons are used for Bouts of Madness, Commonly Used Dice Rolls, and A Body Hit Location Roll. Everything else is self-explanatory.
